title: game crashes when i try to play
body:
whenever i try to start a game i go through the champion select and then the game crashes during the loading screen or after 5 seconds from game start and it doesn't allow me to reconnect
It's not an internet problem my internet connection works just fine

replies.body: I'd like to help out, but I'll need just a little more information.  When your game crashes at the loading screen, do you receive any errors?  Does the loading screen appear at all, is it a black screen, or nothing at all?  Let me know!

the loading screen does appear and yes I receive an error message that tells me "You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again."  when most of the players hit the 100% mark. and when i try to reconnect its a black screen and the same error message comes out again

It sounds like your network can't connect to the server, so you'll end up with a blank screen because assets can't be downloaded.  Go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for a fix.  Complete each step, and test it out in a custom game to prevent any penalties.  You'll be good to go!
Thanks for your help the game is running smoothly now
using the DNS in the connection issues guide that was my problem
Ah, i tried to use Google DNS but it has not solved my problem.

I posted a discussion about the same issue 3 times and I got no reply ..
I have the exact same problem.
I pick the champion and get into the loading screen, I don't load and stay at 0% for a couple of minutes ..
Then this message pops up "You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again."
and no, I don't have an internet problem, it works just fine with any other program.
and yes, I've tried everything with your technical support thread and it didn't work.
and yes, I've tried reinstalling the game.
and yes, I got demoted and got low priority queue.

Your internet might be fine, but it doesn't rule out that your network is having trouble establishing a connection to the game server.  A reinstall wouldn't necessarily resolve this as the issue may be network related, and not game files.  Go over each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out possibilities.  I also recommend downloading our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), which will provide an option to automatically configure your firewall settings, in case that's a possibility.  Hope that helps!

None of this helped .. I tried everything.
Is this it ?
If you solve this problem, let me know please.

I have the same problem, since patch 6.13. I tried every fix of your guide and i downloaded and used your hextech repair tool, but nothing helped me. I don't have any internet problem. Are you sure it isn't a client problem? (A lot of people are having this problem)
